Text: How do I play this on my 3ds?  I just ordered a 3ds btw.  Thanks!

@daddie if you read this, then you need an R4i SDHC for 3ds. Once you have got this, you need to transfer the system files to a microchip that you will insert into the R4i, and then you put the .nds file onto it, then BAM! You can now play your game.
Click on my nick and read how to play 3DS games on PC.
